projects.title: Gurumi the Florist
projects.description: This is a CRUD app for managing flower products. Made with React and Redux for frontend and Rails for backend using Postgres database.

projects.title: Record Collector
projects.description: This is a digital record collection catalog that helps a user keep track of records in their collection and organize it by specific parameters. Made with Ruby on Rails and Postgres database.

projects.title: Urban Tails Shelter
projects.description: This is an animal shelter app that helps organize cat data. This app uses React, Redux, and a custom built API made with Rails and Postgres
